question:
In context with the US approval to sell MK-45 naval guns to India, consider the following statements:
  1. It can be used only at sea.
  2. India is the only country that US has decided to sell these guns to.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The MK-45 Naval Guns can be used for surface warfare and air defence missions among others. It has a range of over 36km and can also be used to protect inland areas and ground forces. Its related equipment are also to be sold to India. Statement 2 is incorrect:    India is only the latest addition to USA’s restricted list of buyers of the MK-45 Naval Guns. Other buyers of the equipment are Japan, South Korea, Thailand and Australia. In November, USA approved the sale of 13 such guns to India.
